Warnings
  • anno declaration on node is broken
Name Rascal/Expressions/Values/Node/getAnnotations

Function map[str,value] getAnnotations(node x)
Description Retrieve the annnotations of a node value as a map.
Examples anno declaration on node is broken 
rascal>import Node;
ok
Declare a string-valued annotation on nodes, named color: 
rascal>anno str node @ color;
ok
Create a node with two annotations: 
rascal>N = setAnnotations("f"(10, "abc"), ("color" : "red", "size" : "large"));
node: f(10,"abc")[
  @color="red",
  @size="large"
]
and retrieve those annotations: 
rascal>getAnnotations(N);
map[str, value]: ("color":"red","size":"large")
rascal>N@color;
Static Error: prompt:///:1,0: Undeclared annotation: color on node
[Edit] | [New] | [Compile Course] | [Warnings]
